text: Amazing. I can’t tell you the sheer relief and gratitude parents feel to have professionals recognise what they’ve been saying for years!
This session with @naomicfisher was really great. After months of lonely battling to support a child who can't go to school, I'm going to sleep more hopeful.

Really thoughtful and informed session this evening from @naomicfisher. Many of us parents who have been blamed and alienated through our child's extreme distress and non -attendance at school are finally feeling hope for a positive future
Really enjoyed the webinar. Actually feel relieved to know that I’m not the only one as a parent trying to deal with this.
This is one of the best courses I have been on. The voice of reason and over 200 parents thinking “I feel heard”.
I've watched the 'Burnt out by school?' talk and have to say that I was riveted.

Since watching a webinar by @naomicfisher we have more understanding of how to approach Miss 15's school refusal (burnout) and she is now making progress stepping back out into the world, slowly but surely.  Such a huge relief thanks to some expert advice and insights.
I really appreciated your messages of hope- this is a journey and we will come out the end.
After your webinar we are more able to support our daughter, speak to her special setting confidently & already supported better decision making with her needs at the centre.
This has been the most useful thing I have had since my Son was 4 and he is now 14, thank you.
Great to know we're not alone
It’s such a breath of fresh air to feel understood!!
Thank you for this exceptional content.
Your talk has been the best talk I've been to in ages, and i go to a lot!
I wish I'd known all that I learnt in that hour and a half back when I first took my son out of school.
Thanks for the invaluable insight.
Reassuring and comforting.
Thank you so much... everything you have said makes so much sense
I also found it incredibly affirming to hear you talk about and acknowledge the trauma parents experience.
fascinating presentation
I also wanted to say a huge thank you for the webinars you do- they are a lifeline to so many of us.
Your words yesterday really resonated
brilliant, clear and informative
Really insightful and helpful.
Thanks for the invaluable insight.
I very much enjoyed it and found it both reassuring and helpful. The thing I think that has helped me a lot is knowing others feel the same.
I just wanted to send a big thank you to Naomi and Eliza for the hugely supportive low demand in the real world webinar today
Thank you for putting your voice, advocacy and credibility to these challenges so many of us are facing. I love the power you bring to your writing and posts
Thank you for your webinars which have helped in so many ways, not least in making us realize it isn't our parenting. It isn't the 'home problem ' school had told us it was.
I have just watched the webinar. It resonated so much with our current situation with our 14 year old daughter. It made me cry.
It was as ever a brilliant webinar, you and Eliza really do make things better.
